page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LIAM
page.content: From 11-12 0'clock I was in school. Then Mrs.MacDougall arrived with the lunch. It is cooked at Taynuilt , 7miles away. It is served at a special table in our classroom. We had meatloaf and potatoes and then arctic- roll for pudding. I played for three-quarters of an hour and then went back into school. We typed or dictated some of the stories for our Domesday project in the afternoon. At 3.30p.m. school closed and I went home. I fed the hens which is my job every day since I came to live in Kilchrenan two weeks ago. I have never had hens before. Next I changed my clothes and went to play with Dominic, my pal. We played on our bikes and then cleaned out a pond in my garden. I had dinner at 7.30p.m. and went to bed at about 10 o'clock.
